title: Textile, mid-20th century
inscribed: 1. Handwritten hanging cardboard tag, "COAT FABRIC TRUDE GUERMONPREZ" 2. Handwritten fabric label glued and sewn to reverse side, "COAT FABRIC" 3. Masking tape stuck to reverse side, "CAT. 25"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Length of woven wool with fine vertical stripes of pale gray on an off-white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid-20th century.
mid-20th century. Medium: wool 
Technique: plain weave. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-24.
